revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Iron Island |image = [[File:Iron Island.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Iron Island. |tokens = 66,500 |location = The southernmost island off the northwestern coast of Sinnoh. }} '''Iron Island''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 683,000 |- | Steelix (Boss) || 3,210,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Tentacool * Wingull * Tentacruel * Pelipper * Finneon * Zubat * Geodude * Onix * Golbat * Graveler * Steelix (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}}[[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
